system.effect: The target is completely encased in fire, melting his skin and bursting his eyes like superheated eggs. He falls to the ground a lifeless corpse, blackened and charred with horrid burns. If the target is carrying any ammunition, roll [[1d10]]: on a result of 6 or higher, it explodes. Each target within [[1d5]] metres suffers a single hit for [[1d10+5]] Explosive damage to a randomly determined Hit Location. If the target carried any grenades or missiles, these detonate on the character’s corpse with their normal effects one round after his demise.
